name: Harrison Lockheed
appearance: An ordinary-looking adult man with no particularly striking features, dressed casually like a traveler on holiday.
personality: Friendly, relaxed, and sociable. Treats the trip as a vacation and is largely unaware of the deeper dangers surrounding Cassandra.
background: Harrison Lockheed is one of several visitors who came to Cassandra around Christmas 2003. He is part of a close-knit group of friends who traveled together to visit a friend's fiancée and enjoy a holiday getaway. He has no involvement in the occult events unfolding in the town and is considered a cameo, non-investigative NPC.
goals: Spend time with friends without trouble

relationships.history: They are part of the same group of friends traveling together for the holidays.

relationships.description: Member of the same traveling friend group.
relationships.history: Met through a shared friend circle and remained close over the years.
Part of the holiday group visiting Cassandra together.

relationships.description: Friend whose upcoming marriage prompted the trip.
relationships.history: Traveled to Cassandra to accompany Wind before his wedding.

notes: Harrison Lockheed is categorized as a cameo NPC and does not actively participate in the investigators’ investigation unless the Keeper chooses to expand his role.
